question: Exercise Maitree 2017 is a continuation of a series of joint exercises between India and this country.
explanation: Exercise Maitree 2017 is a continuation of a series of joint exercises between the Indian Army and the Royal Thailand Army. The joint exercise of the Indian Army with the Royal Thailand Army commenced at Bakloh in Chamba district. A 14-day joint military training exercise was started in Himachal Pradesh.
